Container.Overview: Tree Signal is a lightweight treemap-based hierarchical message dashboard perfect for monitoring applications, logs, and system events. Features real-time visualization, auto-decay panels, and REST API for message ingestion.
Container.Description:
Tree Signal is a lightweight treemap-based hierarchical message dashboard perfect for monitoring applications, logs, and system events.
Features: - Hierarchical visualization of messages by channel - Real-time treemap with panels sized by activity - Auto-decay: panels fade when inactive - Very lightweight: ~50MB RAM, minimal CPU - REST API for message ingestion - No external dependencies
Access the web dashboard at http://[IP]:8001 Send messages to the API at http://[IP]:8000/v1/messages
Perfect for monitoring microservices, logs, alerts, and IoT data.
